components/f/animations/aos: {{#if theme_settings.enable_animations}} data-aos="{{#if effect}}{{effect}}{{else}}fade-up{{/if}}"{{#if offset}} data-aos-offset="{{offset}}"{{/if}}{{#if duration}} data-aos-duration="{{duration}}"{{else}} data-aos-duration="300"{{/if}}{{#if easing}} data-aos-easing="{{easing}}"{{/if}}{{#if delay}} data-aos-delay="{{delay}}"{{/if}}{{#if anchor}} data-aos-anchor="{{anchor}}"{{/if}}{{#if anchor_placement}} data-aos-anchor-placement="{{anchor_placement}}"{{/if}}{{#if once}} data-aos-once="{{once}}"{{/if}}{{/if}}
components/f/tags/sale-saving: {{#if price.non_sale_price_without_tax.value}} {{toInt (multiply (divide (subtract price.non_sale_price_without_tax.value price.without_tax.value) price.non_sale_price_without_tax.value)100)}}% {{lang "products.saving_percentage_off"}} {{/if}} {{#if price.non_sale_price_with_tax.value}} {{toInt (multiply (divide (subtract price.non_sale_price_with_tax.value price.with_tax.value) price.non_sale_price_with_tax.value)100)}}% {{lang "products.saving_percentage_off"}} {{/if}}
components/products/card:
components/f/animations/aos effect='fade-right' delay=(multiply (add @index 1) 50) once=true}}{{else}}{{> components/f/animations/aos delay=(multiply (add @index 1) 15) once=true}}{{/if}} {{#if settings.data_tag_enabled}} data-event-type="{{event}}" data-entity-id="{{id}}" data-position="{{position}}" data-name="{{name}}" data-product-category="{{#each category}}{{#if @last}}{{this}}{{else}}{{this}}, {{/if}}{{/each}}" data-product-brand="{{brand.name}}" data-product-price="{{#if price.with_tax}}{{price.with_tax.value}}{{else}}{{price.without_tax.value}}{{/if}}" {{/if}}>
{{#if brand.name}}

{{brand.name}}

{{/if}}

{{#if demo}} {{name}} {{else}} {{name}} {{/if}}

{{#or customer (if theme_settings.restrict_to_login '!==' true)}} {{> components/products/price price=price}} {{else}} {{> components/common/login-for-pricing}} {{/or}}
{{#or theme_settings.show_swatches_on_grid theme_settings.show_sizes_on_grid}} {{#if has_options}}
{{/if}} {{/or}} {{#if theme_settings.show_stock_level_on_grid}} {{#if stock_level}} {{stock_level}} {{lang 'products.current_stock' quantity=stock_level}} {{/if}} {{/if}} {{#if theme_settings.show_custom_fields_on_grid}} {{#each custom_fields}} {{#or (if name '===' 'Blog Post Description') (if name '===' 'Promotion Label') (if name '===' 'Related Content')}} {{else}}
{{name}}: {{{value}}}
{{/or}} {{/each}} {{/if}} {{#if theme_settings.show_availability_on_grid}} {{#if availability}} {{availability}} {{/if}} {{/if}}
components/products/carousel:
{{#each products}}
{{> components/products/card settings=../settings theme_settings=../theme_settings customer=../customer show_wishlist=../show_wishlist show_rating=../show_rating alt=../alt event="list" position=(add @index 1)}}
{{/each}}
